item.title: 外媒报道：Waymo 正与现代汽车谈判生产自动驾驶出租车
item.description: 据韩国《电子时报》报道，Alphabet 旗下的 Waymo 正在与韩国现代汽车公司洽谈自动驾驶汽车的外包生产事宜。【原文：Alphabet's Waymo is in talks with South Korea's Hyundai Motor to outsource manufacturing of its self-driving vehicles, South Korean newspaper, Electronic Times, reported.】

item.title: 咖啡种植者希望推迟欧盟的森林砍伐要求
item.description: 世界顶级咖啡组织的负责人周三表示，该组织将要求欧盟推迟执行一项要求，即进口咖啡豆必须来自与森林砍伐无关的地区。【原文：The world's top coffee body is set to request that the European Union postpone a requirement that imported beans come from areas not linked with deforestation, the group's head said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 波音公司与罢工工会的谈判陷入僵局，未能达成协议
item.description: 周三，波音公司与其最大的工会之间的合同谈判陷入僵局，在联邦调解员的见证下，双方未能就关键问题达成协议。【原文：Contract talks between Boeing and its largest union stalled on Wednesday after both sides failed to reach an agreement on key issues in presence of federal mediators.】

item.title: 中国飞机租赁商向波音公司订购 50 架 737 MAX 喷气式飞机
item.description: 国家开发银行金融租赁公司表示，其飞机租赁部门将订购 50 架波音 737 MAX 8 喷气式飞机，这对一直在努力应对中国订单放缓和工厂工人罢工的波音飞机制造商来说是一个鼓舞。【原文：China Development Bank Financial Leasing said its aircraft leasing unit would order 50 Boeing 737 MAX 8 jets, in a boost to the planemaker that has been grappling with a slowdown in Chinese orders and a strike by factory workers.】

item.title: 美联储规划 "软着陆 "路径，股市和美元上涨
item.description: 在美国联邦储备委员会以大幅降息开始其宽松周期之后，美元反弹，长期债券收益率上升，亚洲股市多数上涨，尽管美联储在寻求保持经济正常运行的过程中以平衡的展望缓和了降息。【原文：The dollar bounced, long-dated bond yields were up and Asian stocks mostly rose after the U.S. Federal Reserve began its easing cycle with a large rate cut, though it tempered that with a balanced outlook as it seeks to keep the economy ticking over.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 8 月就业人数超预期增长，失业率保持稳定
item.description: 澳大利亚 8 月份的就业率连续第三个月超过预期，但失业率保持稳定，因为劳动力也在快速扩张，这进一步证实了劳动力市场依然紧张的观点。【原文：Australian employment blew past forecasts for a third straight month in August, yet the jobless rate held steady as the workforce also expanded at a rapid rate, reinforcing the view that the labour market remains tight.】

item.title: 任天堂和口袋妖怪起诉《Palworld》制作商侵犯专利权
item.description: 任天堂和口袋妖怪公司周四表示，已对热门生存冒险游戏《Palworld》的制作商提起专利侵权诉讼。【原文：Nintendo and The Pokemon Company have filed a patent infringement lawsuit against the producer of hit survival adventure game "Palworld", the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国称将就欧盟电动汽车调查 "谈判至最后一刻
item.description: 中国商务部长周三表示，中国政府将继续就欧盟电动汽车调查进行谈判，"直到最后一刻"。【原文：China's commerce minister said on Wednesday that Beijing will continue to negotiate "until the last minute" on the European Union's electric vehicle probe, with the investigation undermining confidence of Chinese companies investing in Europe.】

item.title: 美国降息未能提振市场情绪，油价下跌
item.description: 在美联储降息幅度超过预期引发对美国经济的担忧之后，油价在周四的亚洲交易中下跌。【原文：Oil prices fell in Asian trading on Thursday after a larger-than-expected Federal Reserve interest rate cut sparked concerns about the U.S. economy.】

item.title: 美联储大幅降息后美元反弹
item.description: 美元周四大幅上涨，从早些时候美联储大幅降息后的暴跌中恢复过来，市场已在很大程度上计入了美联储的降息幅度。【原文：The U.S. dollar rose broadly on Thursday, recovering from an earlier tumble in the immediate aftermath of the Federal Reserve's outsized interest rate cut that had been largely priced in by markets.】

item.title: 美国参议院委员会就选举威胁质询科技公司高管
item.description: 美国立法者周三向科技公司高管询问了他们在 11 月大选前应对外国虚假信息威胁的准备情况，参议员和高管都认为大选日前后 48 小时是最脆弱的时期。【原文：U.S. lawmakers questioned tech executives on Wednesday about their preparations for battling foreign disinformation threats ahead of elections in November, with both the senators and executives identifying the 48 hours around Election Day as the most vulnerable time.】

item.title: 福特里弗鲁日工具和模具部门的 UAW 成员设定罢工最后期限
item.description: 美国汽车工人联合会（UAW）工会周三表示，由于当地的合同问题，该工会已将罢工最后期限定在福特公司位于红河园区的工具和模具部门。【原文：The United Auto Workers (UAW) union said on Wednesday it has set a strike deadline at Ford's tool and die unit in the River Rouge Complex over local contract issues.】

item.title: 独家报道尽管存在法律问题，韩国尹炳世仍对完成捷克核电站协议充满信心
item.description: 韩国总统尹锡烈（Yoon Suk Yeol）告诉路透社，尽管法国电力公司（EDF）和西屋电气公司（Westinghouse）对在捷克共和国建造一座核电站的数十亿美元项目提出了上诉，但韩国有信心克服任何障碍。【原文：South Korea is confident it can overcome any obstacles to a multi-billion dollar project to build a nuclear plant in the Czech Republic, despite appeals against the deal launched by EDF and Westinghouse, President Yoon Suk Yeol told Reuters.】

item.title: 墨西哥裔美国人媒体公司 TelevisaUnivision 将接替韦德-戴维斯出任首席执行官
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，墨西哥裔美国媒体公司 TelevisaUnivision 的首席执行官将被撤换，该公司整合了两家最大的西班牙语广播公司的内容，预计最快将于周三晚间进行调整。【原文：The chief executive of TelevisaUnivision, a Mexican-American media company that combines content from two of the largest Spanish-language broadcasters, will be replaced, according to two sources with knowledge of the plan, with the shake up expected as soon as Wednesday evening.】

item.title: 早间竞标：美联储大举进攻，市场摇摆不定
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔称降息同时继续缩减资产负债表
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三表示，金融体系的流动性水平依然强劲，这将允许央行在开始降息的同时继续推进缩减资产负债表的工作。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said on Wednesday still strong levels of liquidity in the financial system will allow the central bank to press forward with shrinking its balance sheet even as it has begun cutting rates.】

item.title: 鲍威尔称美联储可能在 7 月会议上降息
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三表示，如果美国央行知道劳动力市场降温速度如此之快，可能会在7月底就开始降息。【原文：The U.S. central bank might have begun cutting interest rates in late July had it known that the labor market was cooling as fast as it has been, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普谈美联储的行动：这是一次重大削减
item.description: 共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普周三对美国联邦储备委员会的降息发表评论说："这是一次大降息。【原文：Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump commented on the U.S. Federal Reserve's rate cut on Wednesday by saying "it was a big cut."】

item.title: 航运公司高管称美国东海岸港口罢工一开始就会引发供应链故障
item.description: 法国达飞轮船公司（CMA CGM）（CMACG.UL）北美区首席执行官周三表示，美国东海岸和墨西哥湾港口码头工人威胁将于10月1日举行罢工，这将立即扰乱美国的货物流通。【原文：A threatened Oct. 1 strike by dockworkers at ports on the U.S. East Coast and Gulf of Mexico would immediately disrupt the flow of goods in the country, the North America chief executive of French container carrier CMA CGM (CMACG.UL) said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 保险公司 AIG 任命 Keith Walsh 为首席财务官
item.description: 保险公司美国国际集团任命业内资深人士基思-沃尔什（Keith Walsh）为首席财务官，并于今年 10 月 21 日生效。【原文：Insurer American International Group named industry veteran Keith Walsh as its chief financial officer, effective Oct. 21 this year.】

item.title: Playtika 收购 Dice Dreams 制造商 SuperPlay
item.description: 移动游戏开发商 Playtika 周三表示，它将收购同行 SuperPlay，交易金额可能高达 19.5 亿美元，这将把宾果闪电战和骰子梦等热门游戏纳入同一旗下。【原文：Mobile games developer Playtika said on Wednesday it would acquire peer SuperPlay in a deal that could go up to $1.95 billion, which would bring popular games such as Bingo Blitz and Dice Dreams under the same umbrella.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔支持修改巴塞尔协议，但表示新草案的发布日期尚未确定
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三批准了对有争议的巴塞尔银行资本规则的全面修订，但他表示不知道监管机构何时会正式批准新草案，他希望新草案能在2025年上半年定稿。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell endorsed an overhaul of the contentious Basel bank capital rules on Wednesday, but said he did not know when regulators would formally bless the new draft and that he hoped it would be finalized by the first half of 2025.】

item.title: 分析师称，随着美联储降息，美国借款人将迅速得到缓解
item.description: 分析师表示，在美联储周三四年多来首次降息后，美国消费者的借贷成本有望迅速得到缓解。【原文：U.S. consumers are expected to get a quick reprieve on borrowing costs from banks after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates on Wednesday for the first time in more than four years, analysts said.】

item.title: 7 月份外国持有的美国国债创历史新高
item.description: 美国财政部周三公布的数据显示，7 月份外国持有的美国国债创下历史新高，而日本持有的美国国债资产则降至 10 月份以来的最低点。【原文：Foreign holdings of U.S. Treasuries rose to a record high in July, while Japan's U.S. government bond assets fell to the lowest since October, data from the Treasury Department showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会就 Rari Capital 误导投资者的指控达成和解
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周三表示，已就去中心化金融平台 Rari Capital 及其创始人误导投资者和充当未注册经纪人的指控达成和解。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission said on Wednesday it settled charges against decentralized finance platform Rari Capital and its founders over misleading investors and acting as unregistered brokers.】

item.title: Truist 在美联储降息的同时下调最优惠贷款利率
item.description: Truist Financial 周三表示，该银行已将其最优惠贷款利率下调 50 个基点至 8%，周四生效，与美国联邦储备委员会的降息行动保持一致。【原文：Truist Financial said on Wednesday that the bank has lowered its prime lending rates by 50 basis points to 8%, effective Thursday, matching the U.S. Federal Reserve's rate cut.】

item.title: 阿根廷第二季度经济萎缩 1.7%，衰退延续
item.description: 阿根廷统计局周三表示，阿根廷第二季度经济比前三个月萎缩了1.7%，延续了这个南美国家今年年初陷入的衰退。【原文：Argentina's economy shrank 1.7% in the second quarter compared to the previous three months, the country's statistics agency said on Wednesday, extending a recession the South American nation entered early this year.】

item.title: Hims & Hers 为特定职业提供每月 99 美元的复方 Wegovy
item.description: 美国远程医疗公司Hims & Hers Health周三表示，它将以每月99美元的价格向某些职业的患者出售诺和诺德公司流行的减肥药Wegovy的复方制剂。【原文：U.S. telehealth company Hims & Hers Health on Wednesday said it will sell compounded versions of Novo Nordisk's popular weight-loss drug Wegovy to patients in certain professions for $99 a month.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔：央行的预测并不指向紧急行动
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三表示，央行对降息路径的预测并不意味着降息进程迫在眉睫。【原文：Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell said Wednesday that central bank forecasts for the path of interest rate cuts don't imply an urgent process.】

item.title: T-Mobile 预计 2027 年调整后自由现金流在 180 亿至 190 亿美元之间
item.description: 电信运营商 T-Mobile 周三表示，预计 2027 年调整后的自由现金流将在 180 亿至 190 亿美元之间。【原文：Telecom operator T-Mobile said on Wednesday it expects adjusted free cash flow to be between $18 billion to $19 billion in 2027.】
